Technique: DOVETAIL (JOINT); WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Greek papyrus
Description: This fragment of papyrus, which comes from the town of Oxyrhynchus and which dates from the 6/15th April in the year 423 of our time, deals with the sale of mature wine. The delivery of 500 bottles of wine was destined for a "prominent citizen" of the town.
